data.title: The 5 Things IBM Needs to Do to Win at AI
data.meta_description: It has the technology — now it needs a startup mindset.
data.text:
ES

Evangelos Simoudis has worked in Silicon Valley as a technologist, entrepreneur, corporate executive, and venture capitalist (Apax Partners and Trident Capital). He currently advises global corporations on startup-driven innovation, and invests in early-stage big data startups. Prior to his 15-year career as a VC, he was the vice president of IBM’s Business Intelligence Solutions division, and CEO of a startup company

Brad Power is a consultant who helps organizations that must make faster changes to their products, services, and systems in order to compete with start-ups and leading software companies.
